Ensure that sshd is configured with "ciphers" = "chacha20-poly1305@openssh.com,aes256-gcm@openssh.com,aes128-gcm@openssh.com,aes256-ctr,aes192-ctr,aes128-ctr"
Ensure that sshd is configured with "macs" = "hmac-sha2-512-etm@openssh.com,hmac-sha2-256-etm@openssh.com,umac-128-etm@openssh.com,hmac-sha2-512,hmac-sha2-256,umac-128@openssh.com"
Ensure that sshd is configured with "authenticationmethods" = "publickey"
Ensure that sshd is configured with "subsystem" = "sftp /usr/lib/openssh/sftp-server -f AUTHPRIV -l INFO"
Ensure that sshd is configured with "kbdinteractiveauthentication" = "no"

checks.message: root, daemon, bin, sys, sync, games, man, lp, mail, news, uucp, proxy, www-data, backup, list, irc, _apt, nobody

checks.title: Ensure no accounts are locked, delete them
Ensure that all home directories exist
Ensure "/etc/shadow" password fields are not empty
Ensure "/etc/passwd" password fields are not empty
Ensure accounts in "/etc/passwd" use shadowed passwords
Ensure "/etc/shadow" file owner is "root:shadow"
Ensure "/etc/shadow" file permissions are "640"
Ensure "/etc/shadow-" file owner is "root:shadow" or file is missing
Ensure "/etc/shadow-" file permissions are "640" or file is missing
Ensure "/etc/security/opasswd" file owner is "root:root" or file is missing
Ensure "/etc/security/opasswd" file permissions are "600" or file is missing
